text: Vaga bitugi a tangaloi tabanagi mo bete na gaiduvigi vena, “A tailengi u biti mo mwere limei tangaloi mo maraga dena tahi.” Siu Elaeja mo veve vena, “Go vano go veve lawe Ehab vena, ‘Go tagaragi na bulemu jariot18.44 A jariot a hosi mo revea a wiligi gairue. A tangaloi mo toa lune u siseri garagara. me gon hivo vine vaiteu a uhe mo tugoro go.’”
